h-desc: We provide integrated engineering solutions in lifting systems and industrial cranes, with extensive experience delivering major governmental and private-sector projects. At Cairo Tech, we guarantee premium quality, precise execution, and reliable technical support at every stage of your project
desc-abuot: Cairo Tech is a trusted name in the field of lifting cranes and heavy equipment technology. We specialize in providing complete lifting solutions from design and installation to maintenance and safety upgrades. Our commitment is to deliver reliable performance and long-term value for every client
desc-mission: To support industrial and construction sectors with safe, innovative, and efficient lifting systems that make operations easier and safer
desc-vision: To be a pioneer in lifting technologies across Egypt and the Middle East, setting the standard for quality, safety, and customer satisfaction
serv-1: Design and installation of lifting cranes
serv-5: Custom lifting solutions for all industries
serv-tx-6: evaluates the quality of a weld and can be performed using non-destructive testing (NDT), which inspects the weld without damaging it, or destructive testing (DT), which involves breaking or deforming the weld to assess its properties. NDT methods include visual inspection and using tools like dye penetrants to find surface or internal defects, while DT methods involve tests like bend tests to check ductility or tensile tests to determine strength
serv-tx-7: is a surface preparation process that uses compressed air to propel abrasive materials at high velocity to clean, smooth, or roughen a hard surface. It is used to remove contaminants like rust or old paint, to prepare a surface for a new coating, or to create a decorative finish. Different abrasive materials, not just sand, are used for various purposes and surfaces, though using silica sand is hazardous and strictly regulated due to health risks.
desc-experience: Years of expertise in lifting technology
desc-quality: We work with premium materials and trusted brands
desc-safety-first: Every project follows strict safety standards
desc-customer-focus: We listen, customize, and deliver beyond expectations
desc-products: the module construction of a double-girder traveling crane with a lifting capacity of 3 to 100 tons, with a span of 10.5 to 50 m.Cranes are manufactured in a general-industry execution and also to operate in an explosive environment,for transportation of toxic, explosion and flammable substances as well as molten metal.They are used in indoor and outdoor storages, rail loading-unloading stations, on production sites.
desc-p-products: the module construction of a double-girder traveling crane with a lifting capacity of 3 to 100 tons,with a span of 10.5 to 50 m.Cranes are manufactured in a general-industry execution and also to operate in an explosive environment,for transportation of toxic, explosion and flammable substances as well as molten metal.They are used in indoor and outdoor storages, rail loading-unloading stations, on production sites.

desc-contact-page: We are always happy to answer your questions and help you start your project with full professionalism. The Cairo Tech team is ready to assist you with the best engineering solutions tailored to your needs.
product-1-desc: the module construction of a double-girder traveling crane with a lifting capacity of 3 to 100 tons, with a span of 10.5 to 50 m.Cranes are manufactured in a general-industry execution and also to operate in an explosive environment,for transportation of toxic, explosion and flammable substances as well as molten metal.They are used in indoor and outdoor storages, rail loading-unloading stations, on production sites.
product-2-desc: Single-girder underslung crane with an electric hoist is load lifting equipment for conveying loads in the space. The crane is controlled from the floor by a suspended control panel or wireless control Cranes are manufactured in a general-industry execution and also to operate in an explosive environment,for transportation of toxic, explosion and flammable substances as well as molten metal. By negotiation between the manufacturer and the customer, it is possible to manufacture cranes with a span of L k and lifting height of H, other than those specified.
product-3-desc: Cranes are manufactured in a general-industry execution and also to operate in an explosive environment, for transportation of toxic, explosion and flammable substances as well as molten metal. The module construction of a single-girder traveling crane with a lifting capacity of 1 to 16 tons, with a span of 4.5 to 25.5 m.
product-4-desc: End Carriages , which are responsible for moving the crane along the longitudinal path using motors mounted on the wheels. They are also used in gantry cranes, suspended cranes, single and double cranes, according to the required condition and based on international specifications and calculations.
product-5-desc: The driving wheels (wheel black) are another type of end carrige used specifically in gantry cranes. They consist of separate wheels with motors, connected by steel beams
product-6-desc: The jib crane or pivot winch is used in fixed locations and does not move because it is fixed to a concrete base according to the winch load, where the loads start from 250 kg up to 5 tons, provided that the rotation angle is manual or electric in different degrees from 180 degrees up to 360 degrees.
product-7-desc: The gantry crane is a giant crane used in outdoor or indoor warehouses. Its most common use is in outdoor with large loads, and it can be single or double girder.
product-8-desc: The monorail crane is a type of single-beam overhead crane, but it operates on a single longitudinal or transverse path, meaning it serves only one path in both directions. Sometimes it is circular or semi-circular. This type is used in warehouses and chlorine rooms in water treatment plants.
product-9-desc: Manual screens, which are divided into two types: basket screen and bar screen. They are usually made of stainless steel with all girds and are used at the inlets of sewage treatment plants to prevent sediment and waste from entering the suction pumps, thus maintaining operation and ensuring the safety of the pump.
product-10-desc: Treatment Plant Gates (penstocks): These are water retention gates made of stainless steel with all grids. They retain water and are used in maintenance work on canals, tanks, channels and sump tanks and the operation is manual, electrical and pneumatic.
